description: Provide AI assistants with real-time cryptocurrency market data, trading signals, price predictions, and advanced analytics. Enable seamless access to comprehensive crypto insights and quantitative metrics to enhance decision-making. Empower users with AI-generated reports and market sentiment analysis for smarter crypto investments.

capabilities.name: get_tokens_data
capabilities.description: Fetch token(s) data from Token Metrics API. Provide either token_id or symbol (or both) along with optional date range.

capabilities.name: get_tokens_price
capabilities.description: Fetch token(s) price from Token Metrics API. Provide token_id.

capabilities.name: get_tokens_hourly_ohlcv
capabilities.description: Fetch hourly OHLCV (Open, High, Low, Close, Volume) data for token(s) for a specific date or date range from Token Metrics API.

capabilities.name: get_tokens_daily_ohlcv
capabilities.description: Fetch daily OHLCV (Open, High, Low, Close, Volume) data for token(s) for a specific date or date range from Token Metrics API.

capabilities.name: get_tokens_investor_grade
capabilities.description: Fetch token(s) long term grades, including Technology and Fundamental metrics for a specific date or date range from Token Metrics API.

capabilities.name: get_market_metrics
capabilities.description: Fetch Market Analytics from Token Metrics API. They provide insight into the full Crypto Market, including the Bullish/Bearish Market indicator for a specific date or date range.

capabilities.name: get_tokens_trading_signal
capabilities.description: Fetch token(s) AI generated trading signals for long and short positions for a specific date or date range from Token Metrics API.

capabilities.name: get_tokens_ai_report
capabilities.description: Fetch token(s) AI-generated reports providing comprehensive analyses of cryptocurrency tokens, including deep dives, investment analyses, and code reviews from Token Metrics API.

capabilities.name: get_crypto_investors
capabilities.description: Fetch the latest list of crypto investors and their scores from Token Metrics API.

capabilities.name: get_top_tokens_by_market_cap
capabilities.description: Fetch the the list of coins with top market cap from Token Metrics API.

capabilities.name: get_tokens_resistance_and_support
capabilities.description: Fetch token(s) historical levels of resistance and support from Token Metrics API. Provide token_id or symbol.

capabilities.name: get_sentiment
capabilities.description: Fetch the hourly sentiment score for Twitter, Reddit, and all the News, including quick summary of what happened from Token Metrics API.

capabilities.name: get_tokens_quant_metrics
capabilities.description: Fetch the latest quantitative metrics for token(s). Note that Token Metrics pricing data starts on 2019-01-01 for most tokens. More historical data will be available soon.

capabilities.name: get_tokens_scenario_analysis
capabilities.description: Fetch tokens(s) price prediction based on different Crypto Market scenarios from Token Metrics API.

capabilities.name: get_tokens_correlation
capabilities.description: Fetch token(s) Top 10 and Bottom 10 correlated tokens from the top 100 market cap tokens from Token Metrics API.

capabilities.name: get_indices
capabilities.description: Fetch active and passive crypto indices with performance and market data from Token Metrics API.

capabilities.name: get_indices_holdings
capabilities.description: Fetch the current holdings of the given Index, along with their respective weight in percentage from Token Metrics API.

capabilities.name: get_indices_performance
capabilities.description: Fetch historical performance data for a given index, including cumulative return on investment (ROI) over time from Token Metrics API. This data is useful for analyzing index trends and evaluating investment performance.

capabilities.name: get_tokens_hourly_trading_signals
capabilities.description: Fetch token(s) hourly AI generated trading signals for long and short positions from Token Metrics API.

capabilities.name: get_moonshot_tokens
capabilities.description: Fetch the AI-curated token picks (Moonshots) with high breakout potential based on grades, sentiment, volume, and on-chain data to help users trade smarter and faster from Token Metrics API.

capabilities.name: get_token_tm_grade
capabilities.description: Fetch token's latest TM Grade and Fundamental Grade insights, including signals, momentum, and 24â€‘hour percentage changes from Token Metrics API.

capabilities.name: get_token_tm_grade_historical
capabilities.description: Fetch token's historical TM Grade and Fundamental Grade data over a specified date range, including signals and momentum trends from Token Metrics API.

capabilities.name: get_token_technology_grade
capabilities.description: Fetch token's latest Technology Grade, reflecting its tech strength and innovation ranking compared to other tokens from Token Metrics API.
